title: Bajaj Auto working on CNG bike, to hit road in June
description: Bajaj Auto is set to launch its first clean fuel CNG motorcycle in June, targeting mileage-conscious consumers. This bike will be part of a new brand and will offer both petrol and CNG fuel options. Additionally, the Bajaj Group has committed Rs 5,000 crore to CSR initiatives over the next 5 years, focusing on skill development. The group's philanthropic efforts include institutions like the Jamnalal Bajaj Foundation and Jankidevi Bajaj Gram Vikas Sanstha, working towards uplifting communities.
